mapper.select: select dy_sku as dySku, name, num, shelf_no as shelfNo, uptime, uuid, owner, warehousing_no as warehousingNo from l_up_shelf_product where dy_sku = #{sku} and owner = #{owner} and num > 0 order by uptime desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into l_up_shelf_product(dy_sku, name, num, shelf_no, uptime, uuid, owner, warehousing_no) VALUE (#{dySku}, #{name}, #{num}, #{shelfNo}, #{upTime}, #{uuid}, #{owner}, #{warehousingNo})
